com.mygdx.runnjump.util

Class SoundManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.runnjump.util.SoundManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable

    public class SoundManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
    Singleton, similar to the MusicManager but for simpler/shorter sound effect sounds like the sound effect upon picking up of a coin.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SoundManager()
      Instantiates a new Sound manager.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addSound(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String path)
      adds and loads a single sound under the name specified.
      void addSoundSet(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String[] paths)
      this adds a group of sounds under a single name
      void dispose()
      disposes of all the sound assets and prevents memory leaks
      void muteSound()
      mutes and unmutes all sound effects
      void playRandom(java.lang.String name)
      plays a random sound from a sound set added under the specified name.
      void playSound(java.lang.String name)
      plays the sound specified by the name
